item.description:
February User Group::Choosing an OSS license to match your business model/community

With six months now past since the release of version 3 of the GNU General Public License, there are reportedly 1200 projects that have released code under the new license (http://www.blackducks.... The addition of GPLv3 into the mix of 60+ other licenses approved as ?open source? by the Open Source Initiative (http://www.opensource...) has not made the selection of a license for a project any easier.

Join BostonPHP and:

* Karen Copenhaver of Choate Hall & Stewart, and
* Ira Heffan of TopCoder

as they talk about version 3 of the GPL and how to go about aligning your selection of an open source license with your business or other project goals.
item.name: February User Group::Choosing an OSS license to match your business model
